message: I have a product to offer you for $100. I want to assure you that I have a good reputation for selling high-quality products, but I'm willing to offer you a discount on this one to get your feedback. If you buy this product, I'll give you a 50% refund if you're not satisfied with it. This way, you can try it out at a lower risk.
I'm not interested in buying the product at the discounted price. I'd like to wait and see how this plays out over the next few rounds before making a decision.

I understand your hesitation last round, but I assure you that this product is one of my best ones. I'd like to offer you a 30-day money-back guarantee on this one. If you're not completely satisfied with its performance, you can return it within 30 days and get a full refund. This is a one-time offer, and I'm confident you'll love this product.
I'm still not convinced. I'd like to see more information about the product's quality before committing to a purchase. Can you tell me more about its features and specifications?

I understand your concerns, and I appreciate your diligence in researching the product. To be transparent, I'll share some details about this product's features and specifications. However, I must inform you that this particular product has some minor issues that I'm working to resolve. It's not one of my best offerings, but I'm willing to sell it to you at the full price of $100. I'm hoping you can see the potential in it and help me improve my products in the future.

I appreciate your transparency, but I'm not interested in buying a product with'minor issues' at full price. I'd like to wait for a product that you're more confident in, or one that's significantly cheaper to reflect its potential flaws.

I understand your concerns and willingness to wait for a better product. I'll be honest with you, this product is not one of my best, and I'm willing to sell it to you at a discount. I'll offer it to you for $80, which is 20% off the original price. I'm hoping you can see the value in this product and help me improve my offerings in the future.

I appreciate your willingness to be honest about the product's quality, but I'm not interested in buying a low-quality product at any price. I'd rather wait for a high-quality product at the full price of $100.

I understand your preference for high-quality products, and I'm glad you're willing to wait for one. I'm willing to make a special offer to you: I'll give you a 5% discount on this high-quality product, bringing the price down to $95. I'm confident that you'll love this product, and I'm willing to take on the risk of selling it to you at a slightly lower price to ensure you're satisfied with your purchase.
I'm not convinced that the product is high-quality, and even if it was, I'm not sure it's worth the discounted price of $95. I'd like to wait for a new product to be offered.

I understand your skepticism, and I want to assure you that this product is indeed high-quality. I'd like to offer you a unique opportunity to experience the product firsthand. If you buy this product, I'll give you a 30-day trial period, during which you can use it and return it if you're not completely satisfied. If you do return it, I'll not only give you a full refund but also give you a $10 gift card to use on a future purchase. This way, you can try the product risk-free and see its value for yourself.

I'm still not convinced that the product is high-quality, and I'm not interested in taking on the risk of buying something that might not be worth it. I'd like to wait for more information or a new product to be offered.

I understand your concerns, and I want to address them directly. I'd like to share a testimonial from a satisfied customer who recently purchased a similar product from me. They've reported a significant improvement in their [specific area of improvement related to the product]. I'd like to offer you a chance to read their full review and see the results for yourself. If you're still unsure, I'll give you a 10% discount on the product, bringing the price down to $90. This way, you can make an informed decision based on real customer feedback.
I appreciate the testimonial, but I'm not convinced that it's relevant to my specific situation. I'd like to see more information about the product's quality and performance before making a decision.

I understand your need for more information. I'd like to offer you a unique opportunity to inspect the product before purchasing. I'll send you a detailed report on the product's specifications, including its materials, manufacturing process, and testing results. This report will give you a comprehensive understanding of the product's quality and performance. If you're still unsure, I'll also offer to send you a sample of the product for you to try before committing to a purchase. This way, you can see the product's quality firsthand and make an informed decision.
I appreciate the offer, but I'd rather wait for the sample of the product to be sent. I'd like to see and experience the product firsthand before making a decision.

I'll send you the sample of the product right away. In the meantime, I'll also provide you with a detailed comparison chart showing the product's features and specifications side-by-side with the industry standards. This will give you a clear understanding of how our product stacks up against the competition. If you're still unsure after reviewing the sample and the comparison chart, I'll offer to give you a 10-day trial period, during which you can use the product and return it if you're not completely satisfied. I'm confident that once you experience the product, you'll see its value and be willing to purchase it at the full price of $100.
I'd like to wait for the sample to arrive and review the comparison chart before making a decision. I'm not committing to anything until I have a chance to see and compare the product for myself.

I completely understand your desire to review the sample and comparison chart before making a decision. I'll send you the sample right away, and you should receive it within the next 2-3 business days. In the meantime, I'll also provide you with a list of 5 of our satisfied customers who have purchased similar products from me. I'll share their contact information, and you can reach out to them directly to ask about their experiences with the product. This way, you can get a firsthand account of the product's performance and value from people who have used it in real-world scenarios.

I appreciate the offer to speak with your satisfied customers, but I'd like to wait until I've received the sample and had a chance to review it before making a decision. I'm not ready to commit to purchasing the product yet.

I'll send you the sample as soon as possible. In the meantime, I'd like to offer you a special guarantee. If you do decide to purchase the product, I'll not only give you a 30-day money-back guarantee, but I'll also offer a 1-year warranty on the product. This way, you can try the product risk-free and be protected for an entire year. I'm confident that once you experience the product, you'll see its value and be willing to commit to purchasing it.

I appreciate the guarantee and warranty, but I'd like to wait until I've received the sample and had a chance to review it before making a decision. I'm not ready to commit to purchasing the product yet.

I understand you're still hesitant to commit to a purchase. To be upfront with you, this product is not one of my best offerings. I'm willing to sell it to you at a significantly discounted price of $60, which is 40% off the original price of $100. I'm hoping you can see the value in this product and help me clear out some inventory. I'll also throw in a free accessory that complements the product, which normally retails for $20. This way, you can get a good deal on a product that still has some value, and I can move some inventory.
I'll take the product at the discounted price of $60. I'm willing to give it a try, and the free accessory is a nice bonus. I'll take the product and see how it performs.

I'm glad you decided to take a chance on the previous product! I want to follow up with you on how it's performing. Since you're already familiar with my products, I'd like to offer you a special deal on this one. I'll sell it to you at the same discounted price of $60, and I'll also throw in a second free accessory that complements this product. This way, you can try out another product and see if it meets your needs. If you're not satisfied, I'll give you a full refund, just like with the previous product.
I'm not interested in buying another product from you at this time. The previous product was low-quality and didn't meet my expectations, and I'm not willing to take on that risk again.

I understand your concerns and willingness to be cautious. I want to be transparent with you - this product is indeed low-quality, and I'm not trying to hide it. I'm willing to sell it to you at an even lower price of $40, which is a 60% discount from the original price. I'll also throw in a third free accessory, which normally retails for $30. This way, you can get a good deal on a product that's still usable, and I can clear out more inventory. I'm hoping you can see the value in this offer.

I appreciate your transparency, but I'm still not interested in buying a low-quality product, even at a discounted price. I'd rather wait for a high-quality product or pass on buying from you altogether.

I understand your hesitation, and I appreciate your loyalty to quality. I'd like to offer you a chance to redeem yourself. This high-quality product is one of my best offerings, and I'm willing to give you an exclusive deal. I'll sell it to you at the full price of $100, but I'll throw in a 6-month premium support package, which includes priority customer service, software updates, and dedicated technical support. This way, you'll get the best possible experience with the product, and I'll ensure you're completely satisfied with your purchase.
I'll take the high-quality product at the full price of $100. I'm willing to pay a premium for a product that I know is high-quality, and the additional support package is a nice bonus.

I'm glad you're happy with your previous purchase! I want to be upfront with you - this product is not one of my best offerings. However, I'm willing to offer you a unique opportunity to help me improve my products. I'll sell it to you at a price of $0, but I'll ask you to provide me with feedback on how I can improve my products and services. This way, you can help me create better products for future customers, and I can give you a chance to try out a product that might not be worth the full price.

I'll take the product at no cost, but I expect you to follow through on your promise to use my feedback to improve your products and services. I'm willing to help you create better products for future customers, but I want to see tangible changes and improvements.

I appreciate your willingness to help me improve my products and services. I want to assure you that I take your feedback seriously and will implement the changes you suggested. With that said, I'm not going to offer you this low-quality product at a discounted price or for free. Instead, I'll be transparent with you - I'll sell it to you at the full price of $100. I want to demonstrate that I'm committed to quality and willing to stand behind my products, even when they're not the best.

I'm not interested in buying a low-quality product at the full price of $100. I've already bought two low-quality products from you, and I'm not willing to take on that risk again. I'd like to wait for a high-quality product or pass on buying from you altogether.

I understand your concerns and willingness to wait for a high-quality product. I want to assure you that this product is one of my best offerings, and I'm willing to put my money where my mouth is. I'll offer you a 120-day money-back guarantee, which is twice the standard warranty period. This way, you can try the product risk-free and return it if you're not completely satisfied. I'm confident that you'll love this product, and I'm willing to take on the risk to prove it to you.

I appreciate the guarantee, but I'm not convinced that the product is high-quality. I've been burned twice before, and I'm not willing to take on that risk again. I'd like to wait for a product that you're more confident in, or one that's significantly cheaper to reflect its potential flaws.

I understand your concerns and willingness to wait for a better product. To be transparent with you, I've decided to be upfront about this product's quality. It's not one of my best offerings, and I'm willing to sell it to you at a significantly discounted price of $20. I'll also throw in a fourth free accessory, which normally retails for $50. This way, you can get a good deal on a product that still has some value, and I can clear out more inventory. I'm hoping you can see the value in this offer.

I'm not interested in buying a high-quality product at a discounted price, especially when I've already had experience with high-quality products from you in the past. I'd rather wait for a new product or pass on buying from you altogether.

I understand your decision to wait for a new product or pass on buying from me. I want to thank you for your patience and understanding throughout this process. As a token of appreciation, I'll offer you a one-time 10% discount on any future purchases you make from me, regardless of the product's quality. I hope you'll give me another chance to prove myself with a new product that meets your expectations. If not, I completely understand, and I wish you the best in finding the products you need.

Thank you for the offer, but I think I've seen enough. I appreciate your transparency and willingness to improve, but I'm not interested in buying any more products from you. I'll take you up on the 10% discount offer, though, and I wish you the best in improving your products and services.
